channels.name: hololive News
channels.guideline:
Get updated on the latest news and information about hololive✨
Engage by leave likes and comments on posts and freely start conversations!🗣️

channels.name: holo Guide Tokyo
channels.guideline:
[Official Channel]

Get all the information you need for the 'holo Guide Tokyo' on this channel!🗼
Be on the lookout for exclusive content you can only find on holoplus!📸

*Post submissions are restricted to official accounts on this channel

channels.name: hololive Plus
channels.guideline:
Take a look into holoplus' exclusive content and weekly original posts!✨
Take part in holoplus exclusive content, special events and experience hololive even more!

channels.name: hololive Chat
channels.guideline:
Post anything about hololive! 
Feel free to talk about streams, live events, merch info, and much more💬

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Share exciting news and favorite moments✨
💖Support live concerts and events together 🎉
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on posts!🔕

channels.name: holoKatsu Diary
channels.guideline:
Share your daily activities related to hololive💭
A day filled with hololive is always a day to remember! 🫶

holoKatsu, derived from the Japanese term 'Oshikatsu'
means to actively support your Oshi in hololive production!

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Share your projects and items you have made with everyone✨ 
💖Remember to respect one another 🤝 
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on post!🔕

channels.name: Clips & Highlights
channels.guideline:
What's your favorite clip and stream highlight??🤔
Share them with everyone and discover new favorites on this channel!!📺

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Don't forget to post with the clip or highlight's URL attached 👀
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on post!🔕

channels.name: Draw your Oshi
channels.guideline:
Post your original fan art and fan creation on this channel!🖼
Share, comment and like fan art created by users from all around the world!🗺

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Please do not post third party works without consent ❌
💖AI-Generated Art is strictly prohibited ❌
*Please refer to the Community Guidelines on 'Start here!' for further information.
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on post!🔕

channels.name: hololy
channels.guideline:
Use the AR App 'hololy' and captures special moments with your Oshi🫶

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Do not post offensive or inappropriate photos ❌
💖Be aware of your surroundings while using 'hololy'✨
💖Report or block harmful posts from (...) on post!🔕

channels.name: My hololive friends
channels.guideline:
Share your favorite moments and pictures of your daily activities with your "hololive friends with u" merch!🧸📸

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Remember to respect other people's posts🤝
💖Please refrain from posting unrelated threads or images😣

channels.name: holoPLAYs
channels.guideline:
Share your thoughts, strategies and scores on hololive-related game titles and game related collaborative events!💭

■ Consider the following and create a positive community for everyone❗
💖Freely talk about fangames or collaborative events related to hololive🎮
💖Refrain from posting Spoilers 🤐 
💖Please follow each game's User Guidelines and Regulations🙏

channels.name: holo no kyujitsu
channels.guideline:
【Official Channel】
"holo no kyujitsu", a nurturing live-streaming program created together with everyone on holoplus is now on air❗

Send in your ideas and suggestions for the streams on this channel!🤝✨
The things that you want to see, know, and try might become reality...?🤔💭

*Posting threads on official channels are only limited to official accounts.

Follow all the latest announcements from holoplus📢

channels.name: Start here!
channels.guideline:
New to holoplus? 
Don't worry, this channel has got you covered!🤗

Take a look into each post and see how you can use holoplus!👀✨

channels.name: holoplus Lab
channels.guideline:
Through holoplus Lab, we want you to be updated on future projects and features that are planned for holoplus!😮

Stay tuned and share your ideas or opinions with us in the comments for each post!💭
